effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Cures [attraction]{mechanic:attraction}.

flavor_text_entries.text:
赤い　ガラスで　できている
おもちゃの　笛。

A lovely toy flute to admire.
It’s made from red glass.
Flauto giocattolo fatto di vetro rosso.
Una flauta de juguete de cristal rojo.
Un jouet en forme de flûte en verre rouge.

あかい　ガラスで　できている
おもちゃの　ふえ。

A toy flute made from red glass.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.

A toy flute made from red glass.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.

Jouet en forme de flûte en verre
rouge. Les amateurs en donnent
un bon prix.

A red flute made from blown glass.
Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out
of infatuation.

A red flute made from blown glass.
Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out
of infatuation.

A red flute made from blown glass.
Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out
of infatuation.

A red glass flute that snaps one
POKéMON out of infatuation.

A glass flute that
snaps POKéMON
out of attraction.

A glass flute that
snaps POKéMON
out of attraction.
